article_title: Opponents urge rejection of new Medicaid fees
article_text:
Total Access

article_metadata.description: Opponents of a state plan to charge new fees to Medicaid beneficiaries are urging federal regulators to reject the proposal. At a Statehouse press conference today, U.S. Sen. Sherrod Brown, D-Ohio, said the Republican-backed plan aims "to gut" the recent expansion of Medicaid through Obamacare, which has extended tax-funded health coverage to more than 600,000 poor Ohioans.
